data.title: Radio & Television Business Report
data.meta_description: Stamford, CT-based Qantum Communications has agreed to swap the assets of its 29 radio stations
data.text:
Stamford, CT-based Qantum Communications has agreed to swap the assets of its 29 radio stations to Clear Channel Media and Entertainment in exchange for the assets of Aloha Trust (of which it is the beneficiary) stations Hot AC WALK-FM and Oldies WALK-AM Patchogue, Long Island, NY. Qantum has also agreed, in a simultaneous closing, to sell the assets of WALK-AM/FM to Connoisseur Media.

Carl has been with RBR-TVBR since 1997 and is currently Managing Director/Senior Editor. Residing in Northern Virginia, he covers the business of broadcasting, advertising, programming, new media and engineering.
